# Self Improvement Command

Run the self-improvement skill.

## Usage

```
/self-improvement
```

## What It Does

This command invokes the `self-improvement` skill. See the skill documentation for detailed process steps.

## Skill Reference

This command invokes: `@skills/self-improvement`

See `@skills/self-improvement/SKILL.md` for full documentation and `@skills/self-improvement/reference.md` for examples.
